"The barsom (should consist) of 13 twigs and the frāgām are two. He should tie the barsom, dispose all the implements and prepare the parāhōm. He should use for it three twigs of hōm, one piece of urwarām and one drop of ǰīw. He should do all these preparatives in the gāh hāwan. Later, when rapithwin arrives, the one who wants to perform in the office of zōt should say: xšnaōϑra ahurahe mazdā̊ and one aṣ̌əm vohū He should wash his hands with pādyāb."

"When someone will perform a rapīθβən, how should he perform it. Answer : When it is the day of Ohrmazd of the month Frauuardīn, in the gāhi hāuuan he should cut the barsom and prepare the yašt. The barsom is of 13 twigs and two twigs fragām. He should place them beside the foot of the māhrōy and bind the barsom. He places as well all implements. Later, when the gāhə rapəθβən arrives, he recites 12 yaθā ahū vairiiō. The one who is going to be (the zōt), should wash his hands with pādyāb."
